title: Apple store Glasgow workers unionise in UK first
description: The UK's first Apple retail workers union has been formed, following US action.

title: Haaland or Halland? Fans asked to spellcheck tweets
description: The director of Visit Halland says the region's hashtag is now filled with photos of the footballer.

title: China Covid: iPhone maker Foxconn boosts bonuses after lockdown breakout
description: Foxconn locked down the world's largest iPhone factory in line with China's zero-Covid policy.

title: Questions raised about AI weapons-scanning company
description: BBC News has seen evidence Evolv, which claims to have the "signatures" of all weapons, has limitations.
